channel.title: Eclipse Server help Java heap space error
channel.description:
Ive went from 718s to 317s for a while and alot run using eclipse so its new to me im understanding it pretty good but when i go to run my source i get this error
[code=text]java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at org.rs2server.rs2.event.impl.UpdateEvent.execute(UpdateEvent.java:59) at org.rs2server.rs2.event.EventManager$1.run(EventManager.java:56) at org.rs2server.rs2.GameEngine$2.run(GameEngine.java:120) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$201(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
ive tryed going into the run configs and setting the Arguments but it stills gives me the error any help would be great thanks.

item.title: Eclipse Server help Java heap space error
item.dc:creator: @angel_the_divine angel the divine
item.description:
@angel_the_divine wrote:

Ive went from 718s to 317s for a while and alot run using eclipse so its new to me im understanding it pretty good but when i go to run my source i get this error

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at org.rs2server.rs2.event.impl.UpdateEvent.execute(UpdateEvent.java:59) at org.rs2server.rs2.event.EventManager$1.run(EventManager.java:56) at org.rs2server.rs2.GameEngine$2.run(GameEngine.java:120) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$201(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

ive tryed going into the run configs and setting the Arguments but it stills gives me the error any help would be great thanks.
